meanings.definition: Feeling or causing nausea or vomiting.
meanings.sent1: The roller coaster made me feel pukey.
meanings.sent3: The pukey smell of the garbage made me gag.
meanings.sent4: The thought of eating snails was so pukey to me.
meanings.sent5: The pukey sensation in my stomach was unbearable.

meanings.definition: Having a sickly or unpleasant smell.
meanings.sent1: The old socks had a pukey odor.
meanings.sent2: The dumpster behind the restaurant was pukey.
meanings.sent3: The pukey stench of the skunk lingered in the air.
meanings.sent4: The pukey smell of the fish market turned my stomach.
meanings.sent5: The bathroom had a pukey scent that made me feel queasy.

meanings.definition: Disgusting or repulsive in appearance or taste.
meanings.sent2: The slimy texture of the snail was pukey.
meanings.sent3: The pukey taste of the medicine made me cringe.
meanings.sent4: The pukey sight of the cockroach scurrying across the floor startled me.
meanings.sent5: The pukey flavor of the spoiled milk made me want to spit it out.
